titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to carry out programs to enhance bridge safety monitoring in the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

bill.summary:
9/26/2007--Introduced.
Directs the Secretary of Transportation to establish programs to provide grants to states and units of local government for projects that implement continuous bridge monitoring technology.
